thread.title: Should Airlines Weigh Passengers?
thread.title_full: Should Airlines Weigh Passengers? - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Should Airlines Weigh Passengers?
text:
If the scale in your private hotel room feels confrontational, consider being weighed publicly at airline check-in.
